column2: Fix incorrect manual watch root calculations.

column3:
You would get spurious "Cannot be watched" notifications
and manual watch roots from the system.

No problem. Any chance this could get cherry-picked across to one of your
dot releases? It should be safe, and it's a fairly brutal experience for us
when the entire code base suddenly becomes "manual watch roots" because
it's all on a local drive.

On Wed, Apr 6, 2016 at 1:03 PM, Roman Shevchenko notifications@github.com
wrote:
I'm going to backport it to 145 branch, it will end up in 2016.1.2 eventually. Is this enough?
Yes, certainly. We can work around the issue until then. Thank you!

On Thu, Apr 7, 2016 at 11:45 AM, Roman Shevchenko notifications@github.com
wrote:
Fix incorrect manual watch root calculations.
